articles.title: What I learned from a Bambu Labs A1 3D printer, part 2: Upgrades and mistakes - Ars Technica
articles.description: 3D-printing new parts for the A1 taught me a lot about plastic, and other things.

articles.title: 21% of the Ocean Is Losing Sunlight – What That Means for Marine Life - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Ocean darkening is rapidly spreading, squeezing marine life closer to the surface and altering ecosystems worldwide. Satellite data shows the photic zone is shrinking fast.
articles.content: A world map showing changes in global photic zones between 2003 and 2022. Reds indicate regions where the oceans are getting darker, while blues indicate regions where oceans are getting lighter and … [+6487 chars]

articles.title: Apple Buys Its First Ever Video Game Studio - CNET
articles.description: An Apple spokesperson confirms to CNET that the tech giant bought Sneaky Sasquatch creators RAC7.
articles.content: Apple, best known for iPhones, MacBooks and other sleek devices, might make your next favorite video game. The tech giant on Tuesday confirmed to CNET that it bought the two-person studio RAC7 -- the… [+1931 chars]
